greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (9 * theta_4(q^3)^4 - theta_4(q)^4) / 8 in powers of q.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1500
formula: Expansion of eta(q^2)^5 * eta(q^3)^3 / (eta(q) * eta(q^6)^3) in powers of q.
Expansion of b(q^2) * (4*b(q^4) - b(q)) / 3 in powers of q where b() is a cubic AGM theta function.
a(n) is multiplicative with a(2^e) = -3 if e>0, a(3^e) = 4 - 3^(e+1), a(p^e) = (p^(e+1) - 1) / (p - 1) if p>3.
mathematica: eta[q_] := q^(1/24)*QPochhammer[q]; a:= CoefficientList[Series[eta[q^2]^5 *eta[q^3]^3/(eta[q]*eta[q^6]^3), {q, 0, 55}], q]; Table[a[[n]], {n, 1, 50}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 11 2018 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, polcoeff( sum( k=1, sqrtint(n), 2 * (-x)^k^2, 1 + x * O(x^n))^4 - 9 * sum( k=1, sqrtint(n\3), 2 * (-x^3)^k^2, 1 + x * O(x^n))^4, n) / -8)}
(PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x^2 + A)^5 * eta(x^3 + A)^3 / eta(x + A) / eta(x^6 + A)^3, n))}
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Apr 21 2006
